title: New Year's Eve Dinner
description:
Dine before you dance! Join for a 6 course New Year's Eve dinner at Belvedere Room. Your $75 seat includes admission to the NYE Masquerade party. Two seatings at 5pm and 8pm - Reservations are recommended - 661.427.4900

UP ALL NIGHT, SLEEP ALL DAY
Room Packages starting at $250 Include: 2 tickets to the NYE Masquerade, bottle of champagne, complimentary valet and late checkout

HELLO 2017
Wake up to a Champagne Brunch at Belvedere Room from 9am to 2pm - $39/person. Reservations are recommended - 661.427.4900
